channel.title: stat.CO updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: stat.CO updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Mixture of segmentation for heterogeneous functional data
item.description: arXiv:2303.10712v2 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: In this paper we consider functional data with heterogeneity in time and in population. We propose a mixture model with segmentation of time to represent this heterogeneity while keeping the functional structure. Maximum likelihood estimator is considered, proved to be identifiable and consistent. In practice, an EM algorithm is used, combined with dynamic programming for the maximization step, to approximate the maximum likelihood estimator. The method is illustrated on a simulated dataset, and used on a real dataset of electricity consumption.
item.dc:creator: Vincent Brault, \'Emilie Devijver, Charlotte Laclau
